title: Entry-Level Customer Support
description: Start as a customer service representative. Learn to handle inquiries, resolve verbal conflicts, and use CRM software.

title: Team Lead / Supervisor
description: Manage a small team of agents. Handle escalations, monitor performance metrics (CSAT, Resolution Time), and conduct training.

title: Customer Service Manager
description: Oversee the entire department. Develop service strategies, manage budgets, and implement technology to improve efficiency.

title: Head of Customer Experience (CX)
description: Shift focus from 'service' to 'experience'. Map customer journeys, reduce churn, and be the voice of the customer in the boardroom.
